import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useWallet}from'../contexts/WalletContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WalletConnectionTest=()=>{const{connected,accounts,connectWallet,disconnectWallet,loading,error}=useWallet();const[testResult,setTestResult]=useState(null);const runConnectionTest=async()=>{try{setTestResult({status:'running',message:'Testing wallet connection...'});// Test connection
const connected=await connectWallet();if(connected){setTestResult({status:'success',message:'Wallet connected successfully!',data:{accounts}});}else{setTestResult({status:'error',message:'Failed to connect wallet'});}}catch(err){setTestResult({status:'error',message:`Error: ${err.message}`,error:err});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wallet-test-container p-4 border rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Wallet Connection Test"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Status: ",connected?'Connected':'Disconnected']}),connected&&accounts.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Account: ",accounts[0]]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex gap-2 mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:runConnectionTest,disabled:loading,children:loading?'Connecting...':'Test Connection'}),connected&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-outline-danger",onClick:disconnectWallet,children:"Disconnect"})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"alert alert-danger",children:error.message||'An error occurred'}),testResult&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`alert ${testResult.status==='success'?'alert-success':testResult.status==='error'?'alert-danger':'alert-info'}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:testResult.message}),testResult.data&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{className:"mt-2 bg-light p-2 rounded",children:JSON.stringify(testResult.data,null,2)})]})]});};export default WalletConnectionTest;
